text: Any staff member of the Child Protection Register who willfully releases information obtained from the Register in violation of this subchapter shall be fined not more than $1,000.

DC CODE § 4-1302.08

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Prevention of Child Abuse and Neglect.

heading.catch_text: Penalty for unauthorized release of information.
